name: HALO COLLECTION LAUNCH
description: We transformed Under Armour's HALO collection launch into a content-generating machine. An immersive brand activation where every surface, every light, every angle was designed for one thing: to look incredible on camera and drive organic conversation.
overview:
Under Armour came to us with a challenge: launch HALO—their most innovative collection—in a way that would cut through the noise and resonate with a new generation of athletes.

We made one thing clear from the start: we didn't want to just do a launch. We wanted to create a cultural moment.

Not just a product reveal. A statement.

The insight was simple but powerful: in 2024, the best marketing doesn't look like marketing. So we designed an experience where every guest became a content creator, every corner became a photo opportunity, and the brand message spread organically through the feeds of Chile's most influential voices.
execution:
CONTENT-FIRST DESIGN

We flipped the traditional event model. Instead of designing a space and then figuring out content, we started with the feed. What would make someone stop scrolling? What would make an influencer post without being asked?

Every decision—lighting angles, LED placements, spatial flow—was made with one question: Will this look incredible on camera?

THE HALO UNIVERSE

HALO isn't just a collection. It's a vision of athletic performance from the future. We built that future.

The space was completely transformed into an immersive environment: deep red atmospherics, strategic LED installations, projection mapping, and laser systems that created a living, breathing brand universe.

We didn't hand out shot lists or direct content. We created the conditions where great content was inevitable. Attendees walked in and instantly understood the mood. Influencers, creators, and media captured authentic moments without needing direction.

THE FUTURISTIC GYM

We didn't want an Instagram backdrop. We wanted action.

We built a fully functional futuristic gym space where athletes could actually train. Real workouts. Real sweat. Real performance—that happened to look cinematic.

This wasn't about fake poses. It was about capturing authentic athletic moments in an environment designed to make them extraordinary.
marketingResults:
The HALO launch delivered exceptional results across every metric:

+15M REACH TOTAL
Organic reach across all platforms and earned media.

+50 MEDIA OUTLETS
Coverage across lifestyle, sports, and mainstream press.

3X ENGAGEMENT
Above average engagement rate on influencer content.

98% POSITIVE SENTIMENT
Overwhelmingly positive brand perception.

+40% PURCHASE INTENT
Lift in intent to purchase among target audience.

+30% E-COMMERCE TRAFFIC
Increase in traffic to Under Armour online store.

TOP OF MIND
Positioned as the reference in local sneaker culture.

The real win: guests didn't share because we asked them to. They shared because not sharing would have meant missing out on the moment.
